item.description:
Join us at Vapiano 12:30pm this coming Saturday - 12/1. Afterwards we will head out to Frog Pond at Boston Common to skate off some calories. Admission is $5 and skates rental is $9.

Vapiano is a fast, causal restaurant serving made-to-order pizzas, house-made pasta, and gourmet salads. You will be given a "chip card" to personally order food or drinks from the bar or from the various serving stations.

http://www.vapianointernational.com/vapiano/about/concept/list.html

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Vapiano & Ice-Skating
